{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Officer",
  "description": "Swift Consulting Limited&nbsp;an Education, Human Resources and Management firm is currently seeking qualified and experienced applicant to fill&nbsp;the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Internship

Description


	We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Administrative Officer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in supporting daily administrative operations and ensuring the smooth functioning of the office.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage office supplies, equipment, and inventory.
	Organize and maintain filing systems (physical and digital).
	Schedule meetings, appointments, and coordinate office calendars.
	Assist with internal and external communications.
	Support HR, finance, and other departments with administrative tasks.
	Prepare reports, memos, and correspondence as needed.


Requirements


	A diploma or degree in Business Administration or a related field is preferred.
	Proven experience in an administrative or office management role.
	Excellent communication and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Ability to multitask and work under minimal supervision.


What We Offer


	Salary: N100,000 - N200,000 per month.
	Competitive salary and benefits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-31",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Swift Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188252"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Administrative Officer Job at Swift Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Swift Consulting Limited an Education, Human Resources and Management firm is currently seeking qualified and experienced applicant to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Internship

Description


	We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Administrative Officer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in supporting daily administrative operations and ensuring the smooth functioning of the office.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage office supplies, equipment, and inventory.
	Organize and maintain filing systems (physical and digital).
	Schedule meetings, appointments, and coordinate office calendars.
	Assist with internal and external communications.
	Support HR, finance, and other departments with administrative tasks.
	Prepare reports, memos, and correspondence as needed.


Requirements


	A diploma or degree in Business Administration or a related field is preferred.
	Proven experience in an administrative or office management role.
	Excellent communication and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Ability to multitask and work under minimal supervision.


What We Offer


	Salary: N100,000 - N200,000 per month.
	Competitive salary and benefits.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hireme@swiftconsulting.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Jobvet Services - Our client, a reputable organization, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary / Executive Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Responsible to: Director, Finance &amp; Administration/Managers in the department

Responsibilities


	Organize office operations and maintain files/documentation
	Manage the Director&rsquo;s contacts, engagements, and itineraries
	Answer incoming calls, greet visitors, and redirect inquiries appropriately
	Prepare official documents (letters, memos, emails, faxes)
	Handle secretarial duties for the department
	Perform other duties as assigned by management.


Requirements


	B.Sc in Information Management, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in a secretarial role
	Age: 35-45 years
	Strong organizational and communication skills
	Proficiency in office software and professional demeanor.


Benefits


	&nbsp;Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.&nbsp;
	Medical (HMO).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobvet24@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Candidates must reside in Lagos.",

Secretary / Executive Assistant Job at Jobvet Services




        
    

        
        Jobvet Services - Our client, a reputable organization, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary / Executive Assistant

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Responsible to: Director, Finance & Administration/Managers in the department

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Organize office operations and maintain files/documentation
	Manage the Director’s contacts, engagements, and itineraries
	Answer incoming calls, greet visitors, and redirect inquiries appropriately
	Prepare official documents (letters, memos, emails, faxes)
	Handle secretarial duties for the department
	Perform other duties as assigned by management.


Requirements


	B.Sc in Information Management, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in a secretarial role
	Age: 35-45 years
	Strong organizational and communication skills
	Proficiency in office software and professional demeanor.


Benefits


	 Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 monthly. 
	Medical (HMO).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Candidates must reside in Lagos.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Jobvet Services
content:
Jobvet Services is a leading staffing and recruitment agency based in Abuja, specializing in sourcing top-tier candidates from the APAC region. We are committed to connecting talent with opportunity and helping businesses grow by finding the right fit for their teams.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Restaurant Manager

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Oversee daily restaurant operations to ensure smooth service delivery
	Manage and motivate a team to maintain high performance and morale
	Ensure exceptional customer service and handle guest concerns promptly
	Monitor inventory, order supplies, and manage stock levels efficiently
	Maintain hygiene, safety, and quality standards in line with regulations
	Prepare staff schedules and manage labor costs effectively
	Drive sales and implement strategies to meet revenue targets
	Train and onboard new staff to uphold restaurant standards.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an NCE / HND / OND / Bachelor`s Degree
	Age: 27–39 years
	Minimum of 2 years of experience as a restaurant manager
	Strong leadership and team management skills
	Excellent organizational and customer service abilities
	Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
	Candidates without restaurant management experience will not be considered
	Candidates must be based in Lagos.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Secretary / Executive Assistant

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Responsible to: Director, Finance & Administration/Managers in the department

Responsibilities


	Organize office operations and maintain files/documentation
	Manage the Director’s contacts, engagements, and itineraries
	Handle secretarial duties for the department
	Answer incoming calls, greet visitors, and redirect inquiries appropriately
	Prepare official documents (letters, memos, emails, faxes)
	Perform other duties as assigned by management.


Requirements


	B.Sc in Information Management, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in a secretarial role
	Age: 35-45 years
	Strong organizational and communication skills
	Proficiency in office software and professional demeanor.


Benefits


	 Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 monthly. 
	Medical (HMO).


Application Closing Date: 10th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Candidates must reside in Lagos.

 

3.) Manager (Female)

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Schedule: Monday - Friday, 9 am - 5 pm

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree
	Proven experience in retail management
	Strong background in sales and marketing
	Excellent leadership and communication skills
	Gender: Female
	Ability to drive sales and manage a retail team effectively.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 3rd October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Personal Assistant",
  "description": "Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Job Summary


	We are currently seeking for qualified and experienced applicants to fill the role of Personal Assistant for one of our clients in an I.T firm.


Major&nbsp;Responsibilities


	Manage schedules, appointments, and official correspondence.
	Take accurate meeting minutes and distribute them promptly.
	Perform other administrative duties as required.
	Maintain confidentiality while handling sensitive company information.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and other business documents.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Business Administration, Secretarial Studies, or related field.
	Proven experience as a Personal Assistant or in a similar administrative role is an added advantage.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Proximity to locations such as Shomolu, Bariga, Palmgroove, and its environs is compulsory.


Method of Application

        Swift Consulting - We are experts in our fields of work, we use the most modern systems and up-to date knowledge to provide support in all fields particularly in Human Resources, Accounting and Finance, Facility Management, Health Maintenance, Education and Business Management. Our team consists of experts in different professions with a wealth of experience in different sectors both within and outside Nigeria.

Job Position: Personal Assistant

Job Location: Palmgroove, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	We are currently seeking for qualified and experienced applicants to fill the role of Personal Assistant for one of our clients in an I.T firm.


Major Responsibilities


	Manage schedules, appointments, and official correspondence.
	Take accurate meeting minutes and distribute them promptly.
	Perform other administrative duties as required.
	Maintain confidentiality while handling sensitive company information.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and other business documents.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Business Administration, Secretarial Studies, or related field.
	Proven experience as a Personal Assistant or in a similar administrative role is an added advantage.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Proximity to locations such as Shomolu, Bariga, Palmgroove, and its environs is compulsory.


Method of Application
